# Contact

![logo](../img/blci_small.png)

If you are experiencing installation/use problems or have questions regarding
BLCI. Please contact us is through an open git issue. Simply [create a git
issue](https://github.com/neurodata/blci/issues) and we respond shortly.

## Maintainer

If you would like to contact us about collaborations or have personal questions,
email Disa Mhembere at disa (AT) jhu (DOT) edu.
